site_name: NORTHWOOD & PINNER COTTAGE HOSP & NORTHWOOD HEALTH CENTRE
decision_conditions: The approval of details hereby secured under 23658/APP/2024/49, deals specifically with the first phase of the development i.e. related to the Health Centre. The applicant is reminded that Condition 5, will not be fully discharged until existing and proposed ground levels and the proposed finished floor levels of all proposed buildings within each phase has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 5 (Partial discharge - Phase 1 Health Centre Floor Levels) and 19 (Ecological Mitigation and Enhancement Plan) of planning permission ref.  23658/APP/2021/1296, dated 12-12-2022 for (Partial demolition, refurbishment and extension of the existing Cottage Hospital to provide a state of the art health centre and the comprehensive redevelopment of the remaining Site to provide residential (use class C3) accommodation and ancillary works including car parking, cycle parking, landscaping and associated works (phased))
